mapper.insert: insert into Comment(Post_num, Comment_contents, Comment_writer) values (#{Post_num}, #{Comment_contents}, #{Comment_writer});
mapper.select: select Post_num, Comment_writer, Comment_contents, Comment_code,Comment_like, Comment_cr_date, Comment_up_date, Comment_de_date from Comment where Post_num =#{Post_num};
select count(*) from Comment where Post_num =#{Post_num};
